name: WPBot
author: WPBot ChatBot

sections.description:
ChatBot WPBot

WPBot is a plugin currently under development

//-> Try our FREE ChatBot for WordPress with AI – WPBot. It is an easy to use, Native, No coding required, AI ChatBot to provide Automated Live Chat Support. Use ChatBot to answer user questions and also collect information from the users using conversational forms. It can be also be powered by DialogFlow, Tavily or OpenAI ChatGPT or simply use the built-in features to provide Live support and collect data. +++ Check out the ChatBot for WordPress Demo.

WPBot Support, Bug Fix, Feature Request

  • We welcome your feedback and new feature requests for this chat bot! This is a new plugin and we want to improve this chatbot’s features based on your feedback and suggestions. *

Let us know if you face any problem or need help with this chatbot from the comments section.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin zip file. Extract and upload in your wp-content/plugins folder.
  2. From the wp-admin panel go to plugins and activate “WPBot”
  3. You are done.
sections.changelog:
0.9.6

Remove the need to activate ChatBot sessions from the WPBot settings

0.9.5

Removed filtering

0.9.4

Fixed enabled settings

0.9.3

  • Inception
